PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_CompareOp: Compare operator for the check. Is loaded using the compare operator templates.
Start of the content that is only rendered if the operator is "has at least". Must be closed using Tale_Condition_CompareOperatorIsAtLeast_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the operator is "has at least".
Start of the content that is only rendered if the operator is "has at maximum". Must be closed using Tale_Condition_CompareOperatorIsAtMaximum_End.
End of the content that is only rendered if the operator is "has at maximum".
